spell.name: Imp Sting
entries: You reproduce an imp's evil, poisonous sting, stabbing at an enemy and possibly affecting them with the devil's benumbing venom. You deal {@damage 1d4} piercing damage to the touched creature and afflict the creature with imp venom.
If the target takes piercing damage, they also take {@damage 1d6} evil damage and must attempt a Fortitude save.

entries.Failure: The target is afflicted with imp venom at stage 1.
entries.Critical Failure: The target is afflicted with imp venom at stage 2. Imp Venom (poison) Level 3; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; Stage 1 {@damage 1d6} poison and {@condition clumsy|CRB|clumsy 1}; Stage 2 {@damage 1d6} poison, {@condition clumsy|CRB|clumsy 1}, and {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1} (1 round).

spell.name: Leng Sting
entries: You use the power of nightmares to magically replicate the venomous attack of the aberrant and cunning Leng spiders. You deal {@damage 2d6} piercing damage to the touched creature and afflict it with Leng spider venom. If the target takes piercing damage, they must attempt a Fortitude save.

entries.Failure: The target is afflicted with Leng spider venom at stage 1.
entries.Critical Failure: The target is afflicted with Leng spider venom at stage 2. Leng Spider Venom (incapacitation, poison) Level 13; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; Stage 1 {@damage 2d6} poison damage and {@condition drained|CRB|drained 1} (1 round); Stage 2 {@damage 3d6} poison damage and {@condition drained|CRB|drained 2} (1 round); Stage 3 {@damage 4d6} poison damage, {@condition drained|CRB|drained 2}, and {@condition confused} (1 round)

spell.name: Linnorm Sting
entries: You replicate the fiery venom of the tor linnorm and inflict an enemy with the dread dragon's debilitating bite.
You deal {@damage 2d12} piercing damage to the targeted creature and afflict it with tor linnorm venom. If the target takes piercing damage, they must attempt a Fortitude save.

entries.Failure: The target is afflicted with tor linnorm venom at stage 1.
entries.Critical Failure: The target is afflicted with tor linnorm venom at stage 2. Tor Linnorm Venom (fire, injury, poison) Level 17; Maximum Duration 10 rounds; Stage 1 {@damage 8d6} fire damage and {@condition drained|CRB|drained 1} (1 round); Stage 2 {@damage 12d6} fire damage and {@condition drained|CRB|drained 2} (1 round)

spell.name: Swarming Wasp Stings
entries: You manifest a swarm of disembodied wasp stingers that stab creatures in the area, possibly poisoning them.
Creatures in the affected area take {@damage 1d6} piercing damage.
Each creature that takes piercing damage must attempt a Fortitude save.

entries.Failure: The target is afflicted with swarming wasp venom at stage 1.
entries.Critical Failure: The target is afflicted with swarming wasp venom at stage 2. Swarming Wasp Venom (poison) Level 7; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; Stage 1 {@damage 2d6} poison damage and {@condition clumsy|CRB|clumsy 1} (1 round); Stage 2 {@damage 3d6} poison damage and {@condition clumsy|CRB|clumsy 2} (1 round)

spell.name: Wyvern Sting
entries: You duplicate the venomous sting of a wyvern. You deal {@damage 3d4} piercing damage to the touched creature and afflict it with wyvern venom. If the target takes piercing damage, they must attempt a Fortitude save.

entries.Failure: The target is afflicted with wyvern venom at stage 1.
entries.Critical Failure: The target is afflicted with wyvern venom at stage 2. Wyvern Venom (poison) Level 9; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; Stage 1 {@damage 5d6} poison damage (1 round); Stage 2 {@damage 6d6} poison damage (1 round); Stage 3 {@damage 8d6} poison damage (1 round)
